author: Ehren Khoo-Steel
description: A rose, Sauvignon Blanc wine, apple and lemon Cognac Swizzle. Fruity, floral and refreshing.
name: Grape Expectations
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into glass with two-thirds crushed ice and SWIZZLE
Top with crushed ice and serve with a straw
